Header.title: Welcome to Ameer Ali Jamali
Header.paragraph: Explore our services, learn coding, improve your German, and get professional consulting.

About.paragraph: This website offers consulting, coding tutorials, and German learning resources. Navigate through the sections to improve your skills or get professional guidance.

Services.name: Consulting
Services.text: Get expert advice to grow your business or personal projects.

Services.name: Coding Tutorials
Services.text: Learn coding with interactive tutorials and practical projects.

Services.name: German Lessons
Services.text: Improve your German language skills with structured lessons.
